name: cursed-body

effect.sun-moon: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
